channel.title: Gal's Changelog
channel.description: Gal's RSS Feed for the Changelog

item.title: Jan 21, 2025
item.description: Posted New Year Updates + Plans to blog. Also created 2025 Gallery page + added the first piece of the year! Small tweaks to marquee on index page.

item.title: Jan 14, 2025
item.description: Completed first draft of website credits page. Added second column of boxes on index

item.title: Jan 4, 2025
item.description: Returned site to regular theme. Archived Christmas '24 theme.

item.title: Dec 21, 2024
item.description: Created a new art gallery page and completed 2021-2024 year pages.

item.title: Dec 13, 2024
item.description: Created and rolled out Christmas '24 theme.

item.title: Dec 12, 2024
item.description: Created and implemented RSS feed for Changelog and Blog pages. Modified Index nav, and created archives of v1 index and halloween '24 theme.

item.title: Oct 18, 2024
item.description: Tweaked witchcraft page. Completed first section of about page there
